#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N = 1003010;
bool comp[N];

bool checkPal(int n){
	int m = 0, temp = n;
	while(n > 0){
		m *= 10;
		m += (n % 10);
		n /= 10;
	}
	return m == temp;
}

int main(){
	int n, i, j;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for(i = 2; i < N; ++i)
		if(!comp[i])
			for(j = 2 * i; j < N; j += i)
				comp[j] = true;
	for(i = n; i < N; ++i)
		if(!comp[i] && checkPal(i))
			break;
	printf("%d\n", i);
	return 0;
}
